    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_bf95f33f24fb5fff3a09fe162ccb067bfd921fc0</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light reflection, transmission and absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion, Übertragung und Absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion, transmission et absorption légères</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão, transmissão e absorption claros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione, trasmissione ed assorbimento chiari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριές αντανάκλαση, μετάδοση και απορρόφηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión, transmisión y absorción ligeras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that when a light passes through a transparent substance into another, some are reflected, some are transmitted and some are absorbed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß, wenn ein 
Licht durch eine transparente Substanz in andere überschreitet, 
einige reflektiert werden, einige werden übertragen und einige werden
aufgesogen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre que quand une lumière 
traverse une substance transparente dans des autres, certains sont 
reflétés, certains sont transmis et certains sont absorbés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que quando uma luz passa 
através de uma substância transparente em outra, alguns estão 
refletidos, alguns é transmitido e alguns são absorvidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che quando una luce 
attraversa una sostanza trasparente in un altro, alcuni sono riflessi,
alcuni è trasmesso ed alcuni sono assorbiti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι όταν περνά ένα 
φως μέσω μιας διαφανούς ουσίας σε άλλη, μερικοί απεικονίζονται, 
μερικοί διαβιβάζονται και μερικοί απορροφώνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se transmite este diagrama ilustra que cuando una 
luz pasa a través de una sustancia transparente en otra, algunos 
están reflejados, algunos y se absorben algunos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Wellen</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
